long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your web browsing experience with our AI-powered Chrome extension! By harnessing the latest AI models, this plugin puts an AI scribe at your fingertips, allowing you to effortlessly create content on any website.

With our extension, you can simply type "scribe{write a sample tweet}" and Chat GPT will generate a tweet for you, on any site! But that's just the beginning - experiment with any prompt and discover new ways to boost your productivity, like composing emails in seconds in Gmail, having Chat GPT write blog posts for you in Wordpress, and much more!

And the best part? You can customize your prompts by defining aliases like "spanish" to "translate the following text to Spanish." Say goodbye to copy-pasting and hello to seamless content creation.

Join the thousands of satisfied users who have already improved their productivity with our AI-powered extension. Get started now and experience the power of AI for yourself!

You only need to provide your Chat GPT API key and you're good to go.
